titleStmt.title: A lytle and bryefe treatyse, called the defence of women and especially of Englyshe women, made agaynst the Schole howse of women.
titleStmt.author: More, Edward, 1537?-1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churche yearde at the sygne of the Swane by Iohn Kynge],

notesStmt.note: A reply to "The schole house of women", which is sometimes attributed to Edward Gosynhyll.
Printer's name and address from colophon. Variant: colophon has "Iohn h Kynge".
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
